layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x84

    LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,16) size 800x18
      LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 84x18
        text run at (0,0) width 84: "This test has "
      LayoutInline {span} at (0,0) size 61x18
        LayoutInline {<pseudo:before>} at (0,0) size 61x18 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
          LayoutTextFragment at (83,0) size 61x18
            text run at (83,0) width 61: "PASSED"
      LayoutText {#text} at (143,0) size 5x18
        text run at (143,0) width 5: "."
    LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,50) size 800x18
      LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 457x18
        text run at (0,0) width 457: "(If the previous line just reads \"This test has .\" then this test has failed.)"
